class.name: Accelerometer
class.author: Edward A. Lee
class.description:
This accessor reads data from a three-axis accelerometer via a RESTful interface. The accessor constructs a URL from the URL and sensorID parameters as follows: 
       [URL]get?sid=[sensorID]
where [URL] is the value of the URL parameter and where [sensorID] is the value of the sensorID parameter. The result is expected to be JSON-formatted data that is an array with one element, where the one element is a record with three fields, x, y, and z, each with a number for a value. This accessor converts the numbers into double tokens and sends them to the output ports.
